from kivy.app import App
from kivy.uix.screenmanager import Screen, ScreenManager, SwapTransition
from kivy.uix.label import Label
from kivy.uix.behaviors import ButtonBehavior
from kivy.graphics import Color, Rectangle
from kivy.core.window import Window

screen_manager = ScreenManager()

class ClickableLabel(ButtonBehavior, Label):
    pass

class Screen1(Screen):
    def __init__(self, **kw):
        super().__init__(**kw)
        
        self.name = 'screen1'
        
        with self.canvas.before:
            Color(.1, .4, 1, 1)
            Rectangle(pos=self.pos, size=Window.size)
            
        self.add_widget(ClickableLabel(text="click to go to Screen 2", 
                                       on_press=self.click_listener,
                                       color="black"))
        

    def click_listener(self, instance):
        screen_manager.current = 'screen2'
        
class Screen2(Screen):
    def __init__(self, **kw):
        super().__init__(**kw)
        
        self.name = 'screen2'
        
        with self.canvas.before:
            Color(.1, .7, .1, 1)
            Rectangle(pos=self.pos, size=Window.size)
        
        self.add_widget(ClickableLabel(text="Click to go to Screen 1", 
                                       on_press=self.click_listener,
                                       color="red"))
        
    def click_listener(self, instance):
        screen_manager.current = 'screen1'
            

class MainApp(App):
    def build(self):
        screen_manager.transition = SwapTransition()
        screen_manager.add_widget(Screen1())
        screen_manager.add_widget(Screen2())
        return screen_manager
    
    
if __name__ == '__main__':
    MainApp().run()
